attributes.additional_details:
In simple terms this new organisation will involve a Committee team promoting the needs for safe roads for Newark.
Newark is a medium sized town , however it historically has been a major through route for Britain for Centuries. Newarks history with roads goes back to Roman times as a corridor from the South to the North.
We aim to be a working party that people in Newark can turn to to receive advice, help and mainly raise awareness about road safety issue that concern us all.
We aim to do more than just listen , through our links we will be able to connect with other organisations and provide a pro- active service in helping to improve unsafe roads.
